title: Rubbish Radar
description: Web app that helps users find and contribute to a map of local waste disposal options.

title: Stock Prediction Web App
description: Web app that uses AI and ML to predict stock prices and display them in an interactive graph.

title: Areomotion Control Fan
description: Built a joystick-operated fan with six speeds and a digital display.

title: Stack Game
description: A LED-based stacker game where players time button presses to hit the middle light, scoring points displayed on a 7-segment screen.

title: Print LCD
description: A program displays user-input strings with 3+ special characters on an LCD, or shows an error.

title: Jurassic Park RPG Game
description: Developed an interactive Jurassic Park game with choice-driven gameplay and multiple character storylines.
